text: ~Quick question, this is still in beta correct? Or has it rolled out to all portals?~ looks to be still in beta

Still in "beta" :disappointed: but we're in good enough shape that we're opening it up to any and all that want access, no more large gaps between old and new aside from the underlying templating which is being worked on

follow up, that code you sent, are suggesting that i should make all of the token links as custom module? because the rich editor won't let me do that. my problem is, i needed all of them as editable within the template as possible since there are non-developers/coders working on the template as well.
